(cold-blooded [coldblood], wasteland-survival [wastesurvival], swamp-survival [swampsurvival], swimming [swimming])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The Desert Rangers are elite warriors who patrol the Desert of Tombs to prevent looters and enemies from entering the Sacred Tombs. Desert Rangers have thick, dust-colored hides and are adept at surviving in the desert.
